scripts.deploy: yarn build && yarn s3:clean && yarn upload:all && yarn upload:html && yarn upload:serviceworker
scripts.upload:all: aws s3 sync build s3://finnishholidays.com --acl public-read
scripts.upload:html: aws s3 cp build/index.html s3://finnishholidays.com --acl public-read --cache-control max-age=0
scripts.upload:serviceworker: aws s3 cp build/service-worker.js s3://finnishholidays.com --acl public-read --cache-control max-age=0
scripts.certbot: certbot certonly --manual --manual-auth-hook scripts/certbot-auth.sh --manual-cleanup-hook scripts/certbot-cleanup.sh -d finnishholidays.com -d www.finnishholidays.com
